subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{top2}}
* [[曲曲]] ([[곡곡]], ''gokkok'') [[everywhere]]
* [[曲管]] ([[곡관]], ''gokkwan'') bent [[pipe]] or [[tube]]
* [[曲論]] ([[곡론]], ''gongnon'') [[sophistry]]
* [[曲率]] ([[곡률]], ''gogyul'') [[curvature]]
* [[曲馬]] ([[곡마]], ''gongma'') [[circus]]
* [[曲面]] ([[곡면]], ''gongmyeon'') [[curved]] [[surface]]
* [[曲名]] ([[곡명]], ''gongmyeong'') [[musical]] [[title]]
* [[曲目]] ([[곡목]], ''gongmok'') [[musical]] [[item]]s, [[title]]s
* [[曲射]] ([[곡사]], ''goksa'') high-angle [[fire]]
* [[曲線]] ([[곡선]], ''gokseon'') [[curve]]
* [[曲藝]] ([[곡예]], ''gogye'') [[acrobatic]] [[artistry]]
{{mid2}}
* [[曲子]] ([[곡자]], ''gokja'') [[leaven]], [[malt]]
* [[曲折]] ([[곡절]], ''gokjeol'') [[underlying]] [[reasons]] for behavior
* [[曲直]] ([[곡직]], ''gokjik'') [[right]] and/or [[wrong]], [[good]] and/or [[bad]]
* [[曲尺]] ([[곡척]], ''gokcheok'') [[steel square]], [[carpenter's square]]
* [[曲筆]] ([[곡필]], ''gokpil'') [[unfair]] [[authorship]]
* [[曲學]] ([[곡학]], ''gokhag'') [[unfair]] [[scholarship]]
* [[曲解]] ([[곡해]], ''gokhae'') [[misunderstanding]], [[misinterpretation]]
* [[歌曲]] ([[가곡]], ''gagok'') [[song]], [[aria]], [[melody]]
* [[作曲]] ([[작곡]], ''jakkok'') [[musical]] [[composition]]
{{bottom}}
